snippet: As Sgt. Bowe Bergdahl was released, a Maryland woman was dismayed to learn that a prisoner swap would not include her husband who had been taken hostage in Pakistan.
abstract: Release of Sgt Bowe Bergdahl, as part of prisoner swap with Taliban, is stirring anger and frustration for family members of other American hostages who were not part of deal.
lead_paragraph: As Sgt. Bowe Bergdahl was released, a Maryland woman was dismayed to learn that a prisoner swap would not include her husband who had been taken hostage in Pakistan.

headline.main: Dismay at Failure of Swap to Rescue More Hostages
headline.print_headline: Dismay at Failure of Swap to Rescue More Hostages

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
